description:
Env: Launch the nova and glance services with devstack and choose libvirt as the hypervisor driver. 
If we launch the VM, the kernal_id and ramdisk_id are set to null, but actually they should be referring to two other images according to the image properties.
title: Incorrectly set kernal_id and ramdisk_id for the instance

comments.content:
Env: Launch the nova and glance services with devstack and choose libvirt as the hypervisor driver. 
If we launch the VM, the kernal_id and ramdisk_id are set to null, but actually they should be referring to two other images according to the image properties.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~houshengbo

comments.content: This bug was resolved by a later patch.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~houshengbo
